headline: Exxon Mobil to Halt European Recycling Plant Investments
summary: The company is halting more than $100 million in planned investments for two European chemical recycling projects because of concerns over new rules that the company says will undermine the projects’ business case.

raw.headline: Exxon Mobil to Halt European Recycling Plant Investments
raw.summary: The company is halting more than $100 million in planned investments for two European chemical recycling projects because of concerns over new rules that the company says will undermine the projects’ business case.

headline: Is ExxonMobil's Premium Price Justified on Permian & Guyana Presence?
summary: XOM's premium valuation reflects its oil strength in Guyana and the Permian, alongside big earnings targets and cost savings by 2030.

headline: IN-VR Highlights Landmark Opening Day at AOW:Energy 2025 in Accra, Ghana
summary: London, United Kingdom--(Newsfile Corp. - September 17, 2025) - (IN-VR) IN-VR, a proud partner of AOW:Energy 2025, is pleased to spotlight the achievements of the opening day of this year's edition, which marked a milestone moment for Africa's energy sector.The Opening Night, hosted at the Presidency of Ghana and held in partnership with ExxonMobil and GNPC Ghana, brought together more than 450 distinguished guests from government, industry, and the investment community. The evening underscored.

headline: ISN® Partners with Esso Exploration Angola Limited to Advance Contractor Management
summary: DALLAS, September 17, 2025--ISN, the global leader in contractor and supplier information management services, announced the expansion of ISNetworld to Esso Exploration Angola Limited, an ExxonMobil affiliate, specialized in oil exploration and production. Through this collaboration, ISN will support Esso Angola in streamlining contractor management and oversight, meeting local compliance requirements, and increasing visibility into worker-level training and competency.

headline: Secret Talks Hint at Exxon's Re-entry into Russia’s Sakhalin 1 Oil Project
summary: Russia is ready to discuss the return of US companies, including ExxonMobil, to the Sakhalin 1 oil project as part of broader economic cooperation.

headline: Imperial announces appointment of Tanya Bryja to its board of directors
summary: CALGARY, Alberta, September 17, 2025--Imperial today announced the appointment of Tanya Bryja to its board of directors effective September 16, 2025.

headline: Kinaxis to Host Inaugural European User Conference Showcasing Supply Chain Innovators
summary: OTTAWA, Ontario, September 17, 2025--Kinaxis® Inc. (TSX: KXS), a global leader in end-to-end supply chain orchestration, today announced its inaugural customer conference in Europe. Kinexions EMEA 2025 will be held October 6 – 8 in Amsterdam NL, bringing together global supply chain leaders from ExxonMobil, Bosch, and more.
